metaDescription: Hi. My name is Carlos, a fullstack developer. Check out my portfolio.
metaTags: developer, backend, frontend, fullcycle, fullstack, portfolio, CV, resume, programmer
welcomeText: I'm a full-stack developer, always looking for new knowledge and curious to know how things are built. I have already developed several personal projects ranging from web and mobile applications to a processor emulator. See my

_positions.title: Junior Programmer
_positions.description: I worked on the development of functionalities for the financial management system, as well as integrations with external systems through APIs. In addition, I also worked on analyzing and fixing bugs.

_positions.title: Programmer
_positions.description: Responsible for developing and maintaining the university's academic and financial web systems. Focusing on EaD, I developed APIs and worked on several integrations.

_positions.title: Junior Systems Analyst
_positions.description: Responsible for developing and maintaining the features of the university's EaD system, in addition to integrations with BlackBoard and AvaliA systems.

_projects.title: ToDo
_projects.description: ToDo is a task management application. The backend was made with Node.js and MongoDB, the web app with React.js and the mobile app with React Native.

_projects.title: The Blog
_projects.description: The Blog is a blog made in PHP using the MVC pattern, MySQL database and bootstrap framework. Content is managed by the Admin panel.

_certifications: Volunteer work – APAE Barra Velha – I was responsible for implementing its institutional website and training the administration team.
Course GitHub Zero to Hero – MVP Microsoft Julio Arruda
